message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $950000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me, and I'm willing to make a serious offer at this price. I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $960000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $930000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $930000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $960000 and $930000, so I'm offering the product to you for $945000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go above $940000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price. I'm willing to pay $940000 for the product.
